channel.title: RDB on Tolggle's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in RDB on Tolggle's Blog

item.title: Oracle's sequence
item.description: One day, I heard from an architect that Oracle’s Sequence may not be incremented, but a random number. This point of view is a bit diffent from my subconscious. I plan to take some time to investigate the implementation principle of Oracle‘s Sequence and summarize an article to improve myself.
